Name: Explorers of the Abyss
About the game: After a surprise betrayal from his most trusted mage, the king of Lescardia falls ill from the effect of the mage's curse, and a mysterious labyrinth formed out of darkness subsequently appears in the ruins outside of the city. A few days later, swarms of ferocious monsters begin to emerge from the labyrinth, and the people of Lescardia start to panic as the kingdom is thrown into chaos by the upheaval. Features Dungeon Crawling RPG Quest System In-Depth Battle System Monster Book Lots and lots of Loot!
